'''Flickering Four-Leaf Sigil''' is an [[Event Card]] in [[Genius Invokation TCG]].

==Story==
{{Description|A wondrous symbol shaped like a four-leaf clover, it is of great assistance to one who manipulates the elements.|title=Flickering Four-Leaf Sigil}}

<!---
==Gameplay Notes==
* When there are two sigils on the field, the character first will switch to the character attached with last sigil and then switched again to the character attached with earliest sigil.

-->
